name: 8th World Conference on Research in Education
content: Education is a vast, constantly evolving work in progress. There is no limit to learning and enriching yourself. With accelerated advancements and changes in different fields and areas, the need for a diverse and versatile platform for the exchange of information, ideas, and methods is required more than ever. The 8th World Conference on Research in Education is here to do just that. We saw great successes in the previous years — with attendees and speakers joining in from all over the world. We aim to build on the learnings and feedback of the past events to make this education conference bigger and better than ever. Don’t miss out on this unique opportunity to discuss and interact with proficient academics, researchers, scholars, and leaders at one of the most respected international education conferences 2024 in Copenhagen between the 1st and 3rd of November. Experience an international platform where you can witness the latest developments in research, innovation, and technology, as well as address both global and national concerns and issues. Finally, utilize this event to enlighten your knowledge, present your work or findings to an accomplished academic community, or get published in reputable academic journals.
